page.title: 17Where I spend my holiday
page.content: In our 6 week summer break our family go on holiday.We go for a fortnight and mostly go to Spain.We fly there and it is very exciting. When we get there we find our apartment and unpack.We dont do much the first day just look around and find where places are.In the evening we would have something to eat. The next day we would either go down the beach or to the swimming pool and sunbathe.My sister and I mostly swim or make sand castles.In the afternoon we would go and have a bite to eat, then we would go back to the beach or pool and sunbathe and make the most of the sun. About 5.00 we would go back to the apartment and get washed and changed. We would go and have a meal and go somewhere to entertain ourselves.When we get in we would go to bed.
